name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (MonteBoomBox)
description:
In Terminal Hacker, you play as a professional hacker. You have more interest in hacking into places than attending college classes. Therefore, you have got yourself a computer which you can use to hack into several places. 

This hacking will require your skill in making the correct word out of the jumbled ones. Once you do, you have hacked into the system. 

Also there are a couple of easter eggs in the game. If you can find them, then take a screenshot of it and then tag me on Twitter (@monteboombox). Good luck, Hacker!

PS. This is my first game here. If you like it then please leave a suggestion on my Twitter. You can DM me @monteboombox.
